title: Burning
description: FOUR WOMEN WHO SHARED THE SECRETS OF A PSYCHIC SUMMERCYNTHIA: Confined in her marriage—and swept up in a soul-shattering affair...ANGELA: Compelled by another woman's past...ABIGAIL: Damned by a puritan code—and held by an enduring love...MARTHA: Branded as a witch and executed two hundred years ago...THEY DARED REBEL AGAINST THE MEN WHO CLAIMED THEM—AND WERE POSSESSED BY A STRANGE PASSION THAT REACHED BEYOND DEATH
author: Jane Chambers
